arStrings.szText: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} grants you {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%+|]{/c} bonus {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} damage on your next {c_important}{u}Overpowering{/u}{/c} attack, up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} bonus.
